settings.name: UTKARSH PATEL
settings.title: Product Management Intern
settings.summary: Experienced Product Management Intern with a proven track record in product development, strategy, and scaling successful ventures.

items.description: Owned the roadmap for a new B2B Budgeting Module, reducing budget variance tracking errors by 25%. Collaborated on a real-time scheduling engine, improving project timeline accuracy by 15%. Designed and shipped an automated invoice rejection workflow, reducing accounts payable processing time by 12 hours per week. Revamped user onboarding flow, increasing Day-1 activation rates from 60% to 85%. Led end-to-end digitization of QC process, reducing inspection turnaround time by 20%.

Managed agile development lifecycle for Vudio.ai, delivering MVP 2 weeks ahead of schedule. Owned PRD for core engagement features of an AI powered CMS, launching a Smart Connection algorithm that personalized content recommendations, driving an 18% increase in user retention. Acted as primary bridge between design and engineering, reducing design to dev handoff friction and cutting QA bug reports by 20%.

Founded and bootstrapped a media content platform to 100,000+ impressions and 1,000+ app downloads within 6 months. Negotiated and executed strategic acquisition of the platform by a private player in 2025 after demonstrating consistent 30% MoM user growth. Led the roadmap for the mobile app, prioritizing features based on user feedback, leading to a 4.5/5 star rating on launch.

Conducted funnel analysis on a Matrimony App's registration flow, identified friction points and designed a streamlined 3-step onboarding process to boost conversion by 15%. Pivoted product strategy to explore a debate-to-date revenue model; designed a gamified matchmaking feature that increased average session time by 30%.

items.title: Vudio.ai (Shoppable Video)
items.description: Managed the agile development lifecycle for an AI powered shoppable video tool, facilitating sprint planning for a team of 6 devs, delivering the MVP 2 weeks ahead of schedule.

items.description: Founded and bootstrapped a media content platform to 100,000+ impressions and 1,000+ app downloads within 6 months via organic SEO and content loops. Achieved a strategic acquisition in 2025.

items.title: Crypto currency & Investment Influencer (YouTube)
items.description: Built a loyal audience of 3.5k+ subscribers and surpassed 1 million+ views in just one year by creating engaging content on cryptocurrency and investment strategies.

items.title: FinNomal Magazine Contributor University of Law
items.description: Published an insightful article titled 'The Decline of Funding for Startups in India 2023,' demonstrating expertise in a relevant field.
